### Dataframe
```{R}
data("iris")
head(iris)
tail(iris, 10)
str(iris)
summary(iris)

iris[1,]
iris[,'Sepal.Length']

#use $
iris$Sepal.Length
iris$Species=="setosa"
iris[iris$Species=="setosa",]

#使用which 做資料篩選
#which開頭函數回傳的是符合條件樣本的index
which(iris$Species=="setosa")

which.min(iris$Sepal.Length)
which.max(iris$Sepal.Length)

#用order做資料排序
iris[order(iris$Sepal.Length, decreasing = TRUE),]
sort(iris$Sepal.Length, decreasing = TRUE)

#merge進行資料合併
df1 = data.frame(CustomerId = c(1:6), Product = c(rep("Toaster", 3), rep("Radio", 3)))
df2 = data.frame(CustomerId = c(2, 4, 6), State = c(rep("Alabama", 2), rep("Ohio", 1)))

#Inner join:
merge(x = df1, y= df2, by="CustomerId")

#Outer join: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all = TRUE)

#Left outer: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all.x = TRUE)

#Right outer:
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "CustomerId", all.y = TRUE)

#Cross join: 
merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = NULL)
```

### Flow Control
```{R}
x=5;
if(x>3){
  print("x > 3")
}else{
  print("x <= 3")
}

if(x>3) print("x > 3") else print("x <= 3")

test = ifelse(x>3,"x > 3","x <= 3")
test

data(iris)
iris$new_species = factor(ifelse(iris$Species == "setosa","IsSetosa","NotSetosa"))
str(iris)

x=5;
if(x>3){
  print ("x > 3");
} else if (x ==3){
  print ("x == 3");
}else{
  print("x <= 3");
}

for(i in 1:10){
  print(i)
}

seq(from=1,to=10)

sum=0
for(i in 1:100){
  sum= sum+ i;
}
sum

sum(1:100)

mat = matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3)
for(i in 1:nrow(mat)){
  for(j in 1:ncol(mat)){
    print(mat[i,j])
  }
}

sum = 0;
cnt = 0;
while(cnt <= 100){
  sum = sum + cnt;
  cnt = cnt + 1;
}
sum
```

### Function
```{R}
addThree = function(a){
    a+3
}
addThree(3)

#with default arguments
addThree_2 = function(a = 3) {
    return(a+3)
}
addThree_2()

#每行程式結尾可加;可不加
addThree_3 = function(a = 3) {
    a+3;
}
addThree_3()

#lazy function
addThree_4 = function(a = 3, b) {
   return(a + 3)
}
addThree_4()

#local variable
b = 3
f3 = function() {
    b = 2
    return(b)
}
f3()
```


### lapply sapply
```{R}
x = list(c(1,2,3,4), c(5,6,7,8))
## 回傳list的結果
lapply(x, sum)
class(lapply(x, sum))
## 回傳簡化的結果(vector,matrix)
sapply(x, sum)
## sapply 等同 lapply unlist 後的結果
unlist(lapply(x, sum))

class(sapply(x, sum))

lapply(x,addThree)
## 匿名函式
lapply(x,function(e){e+3})

m1 = matrix(1:4, byrow=TRUE, nrow=2)
m2 = matrix(5:8, byrow=TRUE, nrow=2)
li = list(m1, m2)
lapply(li, function(e){e[1,]})
lapply(li, mean)
```


### apply tapply
```{R}
m = matrix(1:4, byrow=TRUE, nrow=2)
apply(m, 1, sum) # rowsums
apply(m, 2, sum) # colsums

rowmeans = apply(m, 1, mean)
colmeans = apply(m, 2, mean)

x = c(80,70,59,88,72,57)
t = c(1,1,2,1,1,2)
tapply(x,t, mean)

data(iris)

tapply(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Species, mean)
tapply(iris$Sepal.Length,iris$Species,function(e){list(avg=mean(e),md=median(e),s_d = sd(e))})

s = lapply(names(iris[,1:4]),function(e){tapply(iris[,e],iris$Species,mean) })

names(s)
names(s) = names(iris[1:4])
```
